After the suicide of his mother's morbid , Nica ( Fiona Dourif ) receives a visit from his authoritarian sister Barb ( Danielle Bisutti ) , which aims to assist in funeral arrangements . His daughter comes with a nice red puppet (voiced by Brad Dourif ) who arrived in the mail curiously . But when a series of murders terrorizing the neighborhood, Nica begins to suspect that the toy has some relation to these facts . She did not suspect Chucky is back to settle personal accounts of more than 20 years ago , and he will spare no effort in its path , until completion bloody and shocking . This is the sixth film in the series " Child's Play " , directed , produced and scripted by Don Mancini .
